content.html: This scene is the perfect introduction the MCU’s most interesting antagonist. We immediately learn his values, his style, his methods, and his personality. His righteousness and likability hinge on this scene and complicate his backstory as a Navy SEAL who specializes in coups.
content.value:
This scene is the perfect introduction the MCU’s most interesting antagonist. We immediately learn his values, his style, his methods, and his personality.

His righteousness and likability hinge on this scene and complicate his backstory as a Navy SEAL who specializes in coups.

photo.alt: A wide shot from Black Panther. In an all-white museum, Erik Killmonger’s back is to us as he looks at stolen African artifacts. He wears a Jean jacket and drop-crotch pants and his hair is pulled up.
